thread.title: Gas Utilities Stocks' Research Reports Released on Atmos Energy, Avangrid, CenterPoint Energy, and Clean Energy Fuels

author: cnbc.com
title: Gas Utilities Stocks' Research Reports Released on Atmos Energy, Avangrid, CenterPoint Energy, and Clean Energy Fuels

organizations.name: utilities stocks' research reports released on atmos energy

text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 6, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on ATO, AGR, CNP, and CLNE which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . Featured on WallStEquities.com is the Gas Utilities sector, which is involved in the marketing and distribution of natural gas products, such as propane, refined fuels, and dry gas, as well as the operation and development of energy assets. In this morning's lineup are four stocks, particularly, Atmos Energy Corp. (NYSE: ATO), Avangrid Inc. (NYSE: AGR), CenterPoint Energy Inc. (NYSE: CNP), and Clean Energy Fuels Corp. (NASDAQ: CLNE). All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below. www.wallstequities.com/registration
Atmos Energy
Dallas, Texas headquartered Atmos Energy Corp.'s stock finished Monday's session 2.69% lower at $79.31. A total volume of 999,706 shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 636,080 shares. The Company's shares have advanced 4.52% over the past year. The stock is trading below its 200-day moving average by 7.07%. Furthermore, shares of Atmos Energy, which together with its subsidiaries, engages in the regulated natural gas distribution, and pipeline and storage businesses in the US, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 27.14.
On January 09 th , 2018, Atmos Energy announced that it will release its Q1 FY18 financial results on February 06 th , 2018, following the market close. The Company will host a conference call on February 07 th , 2018, at 8:00 a.m. ET to review these results. The conference call may be accessed on the Company's website. Get the full research report on ATO for free by clicking below at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=ATO
Avangrid
Shares in New Gloucester, Maine-based Avangrid Inc. ended at $47.28, down 3.13% from the last trading session. The stock recorded a trading volume of 1.07 million shares, which was above its three months average volume of 455,210 shares. The Company's shares have gained 21.23% over the past year. The stock is trading 0.52% below its 200-day moving average. Moreover, shares of Avangrid, which operates as a diversified energy and utility company in the US, have an RSI of 37.16.
On February 02 nd , 2018, Avangrid announced that it will be releasing its Q4 and full-year 2017 financial results on February 20 th , 2018, before the market opens. The Company will host a meeting for the financial community that same day at 8:30 a.m. ET in New York. The event will feature presentations from CEO James P. Torgerson and other members of the executive team. Gain free access to the research report on AGR at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=AGR
CenterPoint Energy
Houston, Texas-based CenterPoint Energy Inc.'s stock ended yesterday's session 2.32% lower at $26.91. A total volume of 4.76 million shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 3.17 million shares. The Company's shares have advanced 2.32% over the past year. The stock is trading 5.08% below its 50-day moving average. Additionally, shares of CenterPoint Energy, which operates as a public utility holding company in the US, have an RSI of 34.01.
On January 16 th , 2018, CenterPoint Energy announced that it will host its earnings conference call on February 22 nd , 2018, at 11:00 a.m. ET to discuss its Q4 and full-year 2017 results. The conference call webcast may be accessed under the "Investors" section of the Company's website. Signing up today on Wall St. Equities will give you access to the latest report on CNP at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=CNP
Clean Energy Fuels
On Monday, shares in Newport Beach, California headquartered Clean Energy Fuels Corp. recorded a trading volume of 1.70 million shares, which was above their three months average volume of 1.38 million shares. The stock finished 2.05% higher at $1.49. The Company's shares are trading below their 50-day moving average by 25.94%. Furthermore, shares of the Company have an RSI of 25.30.
On January 26 th , 2018, Clean Energy Fuels (CLNE) announced that sales of Redeem™, its renewable natural gas (RNG) offering and clean fuel, grew by 32% in 2017 - from 60 million gallons in 2016 to 79 million gallons in 2017. The Company also announced that it had been awarded a three-year Redeem™ RNG fueling agreement with North County Transit District (NCTD), the public transportation provider in North San Diego County, California, calling for CLNE to provide 1.5 million gasoline gallon equivalents per year to NCTD's fleet of 167 buses. Register now for today's free coverage on CLNE at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=CLNE
Wall St. Equities :
Wall St. Equities (WSE) produces regular sponsored and non-sponsored reports, articles, stock market blogs, and popular investment newsletters covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and micro-cap stocks. WSE has two distinct and independent departments. One department produces non-sponsored analyst certified content generally in the form of press releases, articles and reports covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and the other produces sponsored content (in most cases not reviewed by a registered analyst), which typically consists of compensated investment newsletters, articles and reports covering listed stocks and micro-caps. Such sponsored content is outside the scope of procedures detailed below.
WSE has not been compensated; directly or indirectly; for producing or publishing this document.
PRESS RELEASE PROCEDURES :
The non-sponsored content contained herein has been prepared by a writer (the "Author") and is fact checked and reviewed by a third-party research service company (the "Reviewer") represented by a credentialed financial analyst [for further information on analyst credentials, please email info@wallstequities.com .
